input.description: You must be logged in to create a member.

fields.name: userid
fields.remarks: Depending on company policy, entry is mandatory or not.

fields.name: comName
fields.remarks: Corporate name - In the case of foreign countries, companies can also join.

fields.name: loginId
fields.remarks: ID used to log in to myoffice, if not entered the ID will be your userid.

fields.name: passwd
fields.remarks: Password is used to log in to myoffice, if not entered password will be your date of birth(YYYYMMDD).

fields.name: ctrCd
fields.remarks: Country code as defined by the company

fields.name: userKind
fields.remarks: Code as defined by the company

fields.name: cntCd
fields.remarks: Center code as defined by the company

fields.name: grpCd
fields.remarks: Group code as defined by the company

fields.name: rankCd
fields.remarks: Rank code as defined by the company

fields.name: bankCd
fields.remarks: Bank code as defined by the company

fields.name: taxKind
fields.remarks: Allowance Tax Treatment Classification (PSN Individual / COM Corporation)

fields.name: okDateSMS
fields.remarks: Company Information Reception Approval Date - SMS(Y:Yes, N:No). Stored as SYSDATE if Y.

fields.name: okDateEmail
fields.remarks: Company Information Reception Approval Date - Email(Y:Yes, N:No). Stored as SYSDATE if Y.

fields.name: dateSendCert
fields.remarks: Date of issue - Membership registration certificate(YYYYMMDD)

fields.name: dateGetTax
fields.remarks: Date of submission - Taxpayer registration certificate(YYYYMMDD)

fields.name: retCode
fields.remarks: Result code(If successful the code will be 'OK')

error.name: retCode
error.remarks: Result code(If fail the code will be 'ERROR')
